paragraph_1: Thank you for visiting our website and making purchases. Below you can familiarize yourself with the return and exchange policy.
paragraph_2: Products purchased from POEL stores can be returned within 14 days from the date of purchase, excluding perishable goods such as flowers. The product for return must be unused, have the original packaging, and be accompanied by a sales receipt. The presence of an identity card is necessary for returns. The product must be returned to the store from which it was purchased. Online returns and exchanges are not accepted.
paragraph_3: If the returned product meets the above conditions, a refund will be issued. The refund will be processed in the same manner as the purchase was made. If the purchase was made using a payment card, the refund will be credited to the card within several days, depending on the bank that issued the card.
paragraph_4: An order can be canceled before delivery. Once the order is in transit, it cannot be canceled.
